data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marceniuk, Alexandre P., Acero, Arturo, Cooke, Richard, Betancur-R, Ricardo (2017): Taxonomic revision of the New World genus Ariopsis Gill (Siluriformes: Ariidae), with description of two new species. Zootaxa 4290 (1): 1-42, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4290.1.1|70 occurrences
